text: Harishchandrapuram Assembly constituency was a constituency of the Andhra Pradesh Legislative Assembly, India until 2008 in Srikakulam district. ==Overview== It was a part of the Srikakulam Lok Sabha constituency along with another six Vidhan Sabha segments, namely, Palasa, Tekkali, Pathapatnam, Srikakulam, Amadalavalasa and Narasannapeta. ==Members of Legislative Assembly== * 1967 - Krishna Murthy Kinjarapu, Swatantra Party * 1972 - Kannipally Appla Narasimha Bhuktha, Indian National Congress * 1978 - Kannipally Appla Narasimha Bhuktha, Indian National Congress * 1983: Kinjarapu Yerran Naidu, Telugu Desam Party * 1985: Kinjarapu Yerran Naidu, Telugu Desam Party * 1989: Kinjarapu Yerran Naidu, Independent * 1994: Kinjarapu Yerran Naidu, Telugu Desam Party * 1996: Kinjarapu Atchan Naidu, Telugu Desam Party * 1999: Kinjarapu Atchan Naidu, Telugu Desam Party * 2004: Kinjarapu Atchan Naidu, Telugu Desam Party ==See also== * List of constituencies of Andhra Pradesh Legislative Assembly ==References== Category:Assembly constituencies of Srikakulam district Category:Assembly constituencies of Andhra Pradesh Category:Politics of Andhra Pradesh
title: Harishchandrapuram (Assembly constituency)
